column4: hey gang, how would i set up a customer database linked to my website? what would i use?

i'm looking for a quick solution: once i set up MySql then I need to  set up my website to take in the information. then i need to have a way to access the information.  Do you know of any tutorials that can walk me through all that step by step?  I have a rutimentary knowledge of dreamweaver and linux.  Thank you, for your help.
don't have any experience with it, have you tried Google already?
